name: ActionHacker
description:
"ActionHacker" is a casual sneak-action game in which the player controls the main character, an electric man, to reach the server room, the innermost room.
The path to the server room is lined with many security robots and security systems.
The objective of the game is to control the main character "Elec," an electric human, and use his special powers and hacking skills to reach the server room.
Electrical outlets, laser sensors, and even water splashed on the floor can be turned into paths leading to the server room.
However, Elec's stamina decreases over time. Break into the server room before his energy is completely depleted and get the hidden secret!
